nodes.description: 周四在伊拉克希尔拉市加油站发生自杀式卡车炸弹袭击，造成约100人死亡，多为返伊朗的什叶派朝圣者
nodes.support_text: A suicide truck bomb killed about 100 people, most of them Iranian Shi’ite pilgrims, at a petrol station in the city of Hilla 100 km (62 miles) south of Baghdad on Thursday, police and medical sources said.

nodes.description: 极端组织伊斯兰国通过在线声明宣称对袭击负责
nodes.support_text: Islamic State... claimed responsibility the attack in an online statement.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致5辆朝圣者巴士和加油站餐厅被毁
nodes.support_text: Five pilgrim buses were set afire by the blast from the explosives-laden truck, a police official said.

nodes.description: 爆炸发生前朝圣者正从伊拉克什叶派圣地克尔巴拉返回伊朗途中
nodes.support_text: The pilgrims were en route back to Iran from the Iraqi Shi’ite holy city of Kerbala...

nodes.description: 伊朗外交部谴责袭击但未公布伤亡数字，重申支持伊拉克反恐
nodes.support_text: Iran’s Foreign Ministry condemned the attack without giving a casualty toll.

nodes.description: 美国国家安全委员会谴责袭击，称将深化与伊拉克合作打击极端组织
nodes.support_text: The United States remains steadfast in its partnership with the Iraqi people and government...

nodes.description: 美国国务院表示正与伊拉克当局保持密切协调
nodes.support_text: The U.S. State Department is in close contact with Iraqi authorities...

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国近期在摩苏尔周边发动多起袭击，旨在削弱10月17日开始的收复摩苏尔作战
nodes.support_text: Islamic State has intensified attacks in areas out of its control in efforts to weaken the offensive launched on Oct. 17 to retake Mosul...

nodes.description: 警方和医疗部门确认了袭击事件
医疗来源报道朝圣者返回伊朗的行程
nodes.support_text: 医疗来源报道朝圣者返回伊朗的行程

Iran’s Foreign Ministry condemned the attack without giving a casualty toll.
